column4: Hi again, I still have the same problem. I'm running gnome, I want to edit files over sftp or scp in a way that when I save in the text-editor it overwrites the file (instead of saving then having to upload seperately) - gedit does fine for ftp:// but not sftp:// or scp:// - are there any plugins or other programs I can use?
hey guys, to switch from gnome to kde do i just do apt-get install kde-desktop and reboot?
be aware that installing kde will mess with your menus
I had it before, I'm going back because most of gnomes functionality is sucky
